Von.summary: Gets the turn-on or threshold voltage (von or vth).

SaturationVoltage.remarks: If vds is larger than vdsat, then the transistor can be considered to be in the saturation region.

Mode.summary: Gets the current mode of operation. A value of -1.0 means that the source and drain have switched.

GateSourceCharge.summary: Gets the charge on the gate-source capacitance (qgs).

GateDrainCharge.summary: Gets the charge on the gate-drain capacitance (qgd).

GateBulkCharge.summary: Gets the charge on the gate-bulk capacitance (cgb).

BulkSourceCharge.summary: Gets the charge on the bulk-source capacitance (qbs).

BulkDrainCharge.summary: Gets the charge on the bulk-drain capacitance (qbd).

SourceConductance.summary: Gets the conductance of the source diffusion region.
SourceConductance.value: The conductance of the source diffusion region.

SourceResistance.summary: Gets the resistance of the source diffusion region.
SourceResistance.value: The resistance of the source diffusion region.

DrainConductance.summary: Gets the conductance of the drain diffusion region.
DrainConductance.value: The conductance of the drain diffusion region.

DrainResistance.summary: Gets the resistance of the drain diffusion region.
DrainResistance.value: The resistance of the drain diffusion region.

CriticalSourceVoltage.summary: Gets the critical voltage of the source junction.

CriticalDrainVoltage.summary: Gets the critical voltage of the drain junction.

ThermalDrain.summary: Gets the noise source that represents the thermal noise of the drain resistance.
ThermalDrain.value: The thermal noise source for the drain.

ThermalSource.summary: Gets the noise source that represents the thermal noise of the source resistance.
ThermalSource.value: The thermal noise source for the source.

ShotNoise.summary: Gets the noise source that represents the shot noise of the drain-source current.
ShotNoise.value: The shot noise source for the drain-source current.

FlickerNoise.summary: Gets the noise source that represents the flicker noise of the drain-source current.
FlickerNoise.value: The flicker noise source for the drain-source current.

Initialize.summary: Initializes the voltages that need to be used for calculating the current iteration.
Initialize.param: If set to true, the voltages have been limited to help convergence. If this is the case, then a new iteration should be calculated.
